snippet: Aided by public dollars, developers are offering more than 600,000 square feet of new office and retail space at attractive rents in the center of the Pennsylvania city.
abstract: More than 600,000 square feet of new office and retail space is under construction in the long-depressed center of Allentown, Pa, as part of an unusual state-sanctioned project; Neighborhood Improvement Zone allows revenues from tenants' tax bills to be used to pay down some of the debt incurred by developers during construction.
lead_paragraph: Aided by public dollars, developers are offering more than 600,000 square feet of new office and retail space at attractive rents in the center of the Pennsylvania city.

headline.main: Tax Program Aims to Reverse Decades-Long Decline in Allentown
headline.print_headline: Tax Program Aims to Reverse Decades-Long Decline in Allentown
